item.description: CRDT 学习笔记。 CRDT 相关资源 CRDT wiki CRDT Website CRDT Research Awesome CRDT 背景知识 A CRDT Primer Part I: Defanging Order Theory Order Definition An Order set is a binary relation $\le$ on a set $\mathcal{S}$, written $(\mathcal{S},\le)$. Core concepts If we can say that $a \le b$ or $b \le a$, then we know that $a$ is comparable to $b$.
